Projects

Liz Gorman Art Photography

A sleek photography portfolio website

A multipage showcase of the photographers work. Minimalist design with bold, photo-heavy content.

Built with Gatsby.

Code Live

To the pub!

A nifty pub finding web app

Find the nearest pub. Immediately.

Get directions, filter by tag, edit location.

MapboxGL JS library, SCSS, Vanilla JS ;; Node, Express, MongoDB Atlas.

Code Demo

Frikkin Aliens

A retro 2D alien shooter game

A simple but effective space shooting game. Includes a variety of weapons, enemies and powerups.

Code Demo

Vocabify

A novel vocabulary building web app

Paste in your text from your chosen source and the app will predict and supply you with the definitions of the words that you don't know.

React ;; Node, Express, MongoDB, JWT, Passport.js, (unofficial) Google dictionary API.

Code Demo

Squiggler

A collaborative doodle game

A non-competitive drawing game

Complete the squiggle to finish a doodle then make a new squiggle for a future player. Browse the gallery. Log in to play with friends.

Express, Passport.js, Handlebars, and MongoDB Atlas.

Code Demo

About

Me

I'm interesting in harnessing the power of technology and the internet to make the world a more beautiful, efficient and interconnected place.

I am seeking a junior position in a team where I can learn, grow and add value in an enthusiastic and supportive workplace.

I have a degree in Mathematics and Physics and the History and Philosophy of Science and have previous professional experience ranging from teaching English to working in schools to being a busy chef.

I have lived in a few other countries and I'm always willing to explore new avenues for exciting adventures.

Please see a selection of my projects for examples of my work or reach out to say hi.

Currently based in the UK.

What I know

The best place to get an idea of what I can do is by looking at my projects.
